title: Microsoft Azure IoT with resin.io
text: Microsoft has published an open-source SDK for their Azure IoT Gateway that enables gateway-connected devices to communicate with Azure IoT Hub. Lets wrap it up with resin.io

title: Etcher-headless [WIP]
text: An Etcher based automatic drive flashing device. This project was hacked in a beautiful night during the resin.io 2016 session - aiming to be a proof-of-concept for automated multi-flashing device.

title: Staged rollouts POC on the resin.io Forum
text: @imrehg has put together a script that leverages update locking to issue updates to subset of your applications device
